familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $100,001 - $1,000,000 or more in Rent or Royalties income from K MARYLAND ASSOCIATES, LLC (Residential Real Estate in Baltimore, Garrett and Prince George’s counties in Maryland) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump’s senior adviser.
